content: Hi, I'm reaching out about our company's clinical trial data. We've been using a specific software tool to manage our trials, but I'm having trouble getting an accurate picture of our trial performance.
I'd be happy to help you with that! Can you tell me more about the software tool you're using? Is it a proprietary system or open-source?

We've been using a custom-built version of the trial management platform, but I'm not sure if we're getting all the data we need. We've tried to use some standard reports, but they don't seem to be giving us the insights we want.

I see. Have you considered using a third-party tool to supplement your existing software? Sometimes these tools can provide additional data or reporting capabilities that might help clarify things for you.

That's an interesting idea, but I'm not sure if we'd be able to integrate it with our current system. We've got a lot of customizations and workarounds in place already, so adding another tool might just add more complexity.

I understand your concerns about integration, but sometimes the benefits of using an additional tool outweigh the potential drawbacks. Can I ask what specific data or insights you're trying to get out of your trial performance reports?
